welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Westchester, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful scenery, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. We hope you have a memorable experience here!"

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private jet flights and offers exclusive amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic airlines and has 13 gates.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international and domestic airlines and has 9 gates.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international airlines and has 16 gates.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines and has 14 gates.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost airlines and has 14 gates.

wifi.note: This network is free for all passengers and does not require a password.
